ygData.subject: Re: How do I make sewing kits...
ygData.msgSnippet: yes you can, but it s more expensive and more tedious than skewers. Sewing kit (if I remember right) is a thimble mold, needle mold, metal bits, and water.
ygData.messageBody:
yes you can, but it's more expensive and more tedious than skewers. Sewing
kit (if I remember right) is a thimble mold, needle mold, metal bits, and
water. Check the smithy book, it's got the right ingredients :)
-Rennin of E'Ci
Trade Council GM
